data.actual_result: It highlights the message + the username and timestamp
data.expected_result: It shouldn't highlight the username and timestamp unless you start highlighting from the username part
data.short_description: When trying to highlight the beginning of a message it will highlight the username and timestamp as well (did not happen before) [Windows specific]
data.steps_to_repro: - Try to highlight something from the beginning of a message - Observe how it highlights the username and timestamp with it
